sections.heading: and regulations; authority of board
sections.text: The Board of Educational Lands and Funds shall have the power and authority to prescribe such rules and regulations as it may deem necessary and proper, but which are not inconsistent with the Constitution and statutes of this state, relating to the leasing of sch

72-910.Rules and regulations; authority of board.

The Board of Educational Lands and Funds shall have the power and authority to prescribe such rules and regulations as it may deem necessary and proper, but which are not inconsistent with the Constitution and statutes of this state, relating to the leasing of school and public lands for oil and gas exploration and development.

SourceLaws 1943, c. 164, ยง 10, p. 582;R.S.1943, ยง 72-910.
